ta.title: சால்ட் கார்ப்பரேஷன் சுற்றறிக்கைகளுக்கு ஒரு தொகையை வழங்குகிறது
body_lines: இந்த பணத்திற்கு ரூ.. தணிக்கை பரிந்துரைத்த தணிக்கை: சுற்றறிக்கைகளை செலுத்த வேண்டும்.

en.title: Salt Corporation offers a sum of money to circulars
body_lines: The National Audit Office has issued an additional sum of Rs. 30 to Rs.Audit report states.
Salt Salt Salvation was paid Rs.
The audit has revealed that this money has been paid a daily allowance between Rs.. The audit recommended by the audit: Payment of Circulars should be taken.

summary_lines: Salt Corporation paid Rs. to circulars, with an additional Rs. 30 issued by the National Audit Office. The audit found the payment was a daily allowance, recommending it be continued.
